text.autoconfig.oneclickoneblock.title: One Click One Block
Amount of delay after insta-breaking the first block in ticks.

Showing a message on hotbar when disabling delay.
(e.g. by pressing the disabling key)
oneclickoneblock.message.first_time_trig: One Click One Block: This mod adds a little delay after insta-braking the first block. Delay and other aspects are configurable. (This message only shows up once)
oneclickoneblock.message.delay_disabled: One Click One Block: Delay Disabled
oneclickoneblock.message.delay_enabled: One Click One Block: Delay Enabled
